meanings.definition: Skivvied (verb): past tense of skivvy - to work as a servant or laborer
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, he skivvied in the garden, helping with planting.
meanings.sent2: She skivvied at the restaurant, clearing tables and washing dishes.
meanings.sent3: The cat skivvied around the house, pretending to be a diligent servant.
meanings.sent4: The sun skivvied across the sky, marking the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The ants skivvied in a line, carrying food back to their nest.

meanings.definition: Skivvied (adjective): wearing or relating to men's underwear or undergarments
meanings.sent1: He bought a new skivvied set of undergarments for the trip.
meanings.sent2: The store had a sale on skivvied boxer briefs, so he stocked up.
meanings.sent3: She joked that his skivvied socks were his lucky charm.
meanings.sent4: The skivvied undershirt hugged his torso comfortably.
meanings.sent5: The skivvied underwear had a soft, breathable fabric.
